name: Humanloop
headline: Humanloop is the LLM evals platform for enterprises.
description: Humanloop is the LLM evals platform for enterprises. Teams at Gusto, Vanta and Duolingo use Humanloop to ship reliable AI products. We enable you to adopt best practices for prompt management, evaluation and observability.

founders.name: Raza Habib, Founder
founders.description: Ex-MonolithAI and Google. ML PhD @ UCL and MSc in Physics @ Cambridge.

founders.name: Jordan Burgess, Founder
founders.description:
Cofounder at Humanloop.

NLU research @ Alexa,
MPhil Machine Learning Cambridge
Undergrad at Cambridge and MIT.

founders.name: Peter Hayes, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO @Humanloop. Previously Co-founder @Certua. ML PhD at UCL and BSc Mathematics at Trinity.

Platform
[Pricing](https://humanloop.com/</pricing>)[Case Studies](https://humanloop.com/</case-studies>)[Blog](https://humanloop.com/</blog>)[Docs](https://humanloop.com/<https:/humanloop.com/docs/>)
[Sign in](https://humanloop.com/<https:/app.humanloop.com/login>)[Book a demo](https://humanloop.com/</demo>)
# Your AI product needs evals
The LLM evals platform for enterprises. Humanloop gives you the tools that top teams use to ship and scale AI with confidence.
[Book a demo](https://humanloop.com/</demo>)[Try now](https://humanloop.com/<https:/app.humanloop.com/signup>)
![Code + Data + Prompts](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fproduct%2Fproduct-shot-1.png&w=3840&q=75)
DevelopEvaluateObserve
Problem
# LLMs break traditional software development
Code-centric tools and workflows aren't suited for AI systems that demand iterative, data-driven development guided by domain expertise.
#### Traditional Software
Code
Deterministic
Unit Tests
#### AI Development
Code + Data + Prompts
Subjective, Stochastic
Needs evals
![issues with traditional software development for llms](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Ffeature-set-first.png&w=1080&q=75)
Solution
# Humanloop is the LLM evals platform for teams to ship AI products that succeed
[01Develop your Prompts and Agents in code or UI](https://humanloop.com/</platform/prompt-management>)
## Prompt Editor
Collaborate with your team in an interactive environment that is backed by evals
![Prompt, Tool and Agent Editors](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fbento-grid-items%2F1.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Version Control
Every edit to your prompts, datasets, evaluators tracked
![Prompt, Tool and Agent Editors](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fbento-grid-items%2F2.png&w=2048&q=75)
## Every Model
Use the best model, from any AI provider, without the lock in
![Prompt, Tool and Agent Editors](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fbento-grid-items%2F3.png&w=2048&q=75)
[02Evaluate automatically, leveraging domain experts](https://humanloop.com/</platform/evaluations>)
## CI/CD
Incorporate into your deployment process to prevent regressions
![Prompt, Tool and Agent Editors](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fbento-grid-items%2F4cicd.png&w=3840&q=75)
## AI and code automatic evals
Scalable and fast evaluations
![Prompt, Tool and Agent Editors](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fbento-grid-items%2F5.png&w=2048&q=75)
## Human review
Intuitive UI to get your subject matter experts to judge the outputs
![Prompt, Tool and Agent Editors](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fbento-grid-items%2F6.png&w=2048&q=75)
[03Observe issues and optimize your system](https://humanloop.com/</platform/observability>)
## Alerting and guardrails
Get notified of issues before your users notice
![Prompt, Tool and Agent Editors](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fbento-grid-items%2F7.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Online evaluations
Capture user feedback and evals on your live data
![Prompt, Tool and Agent Editors](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fbento-grid-items%2F8.png&w=2048&q=75)
## Tracing and logging
See each step in a RAG system with the ability to replay any outputs
![Prompt, Tool and Agent Editors](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fbento-grid-items%2F9.png&w=2048&q=75)
## Great AI teams build on Humanloop
[![Perlin Noise](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fperlin-noise-static.png&w=3840&q=75)![Dixa](https://humanloop.com/assets/customers/dixa-logo.svg)![Dixa](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcustomers%2Fdixa-founders.jpg&w=3840&q=75)**We're shipping new AI features about 3x faster.** We don't make any new LLM deployment decisions before evaluating new models via Humanloop first.Daniele AlfaroneSr. Director of Engineering at Dixa](https://humanloop.com/</customer/dixa>)
[![Perlin Noise](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fperlin-noise-static.png&w=3840&q=75)![Filevine](https://humanloop.com/assets/customers/filevine-logo.svg)![Filevine](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcustomers%2Ffilevine.jpg&w=3840&q=75)**We doubled revenue with our AI product SKUs thanks to Humanloop.** Our legal experts now collaborate with our entire team of data scientists, PMs, and engineers to scale our rapidly growing GenAI product lines.Alex McLaughlinVice President of Product at Filevine](https://humanloop.com/</customer/filevine>)
[![Perlin Noise](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fperlin-noise-static.png&w=3840&q=75)![Athena](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcustomers%2Fathena.png&w=640&q=75)![Athena](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcustomers%2Fathenateam.jpg&w=3840&q=75)Humanloop was instrumental in rolling out AI across our organization and we’ve seen huge productivity gains as a result.Nathan LabenzAI lead at Athena](https://humanloop.com/</customer/athena>)
[![Perlin Noise](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fperlin-noise-static.png&w=3840&q=75)![FMG](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcustomers%2Ffmg-logo.png&w=640&q=75)![FMG](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcustomers%2Ffmg-thumbnail.jpg&w=3840&q=75)**We saved 15x in costs** by fine-tuning smaller models and using Humanloop to match GPT-4 performance.Lucas JansDirector of Product at FMG](https://humanloop.com/</customer/fmg>)
[![Perlin Noise](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fperlin-noise-static.png&w=3840&q=75)![Twain](https://humanloop.com/assets/customers/twain.svg)![Twain](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcustomers%2Ftwain-thumbnail.jpg&w=3840&q=75)We're super excited about Humanloop. It drastically reduced the development time of extremely complex features. It’s a huge leap forward and Humanloop has been instrumental.Mohamed ChainFounder and CEO of Twain](https://humanloop.com/</customer/twain>)
# Align product, engineering, and domain experts to drive AI development
Product managers Increase team velocity and ensure AI performance meets your business objectives.
Engineers Let domain experts safely edit prompts in a version controlled environment. Sync with code and run evals in CI/CD to deploy with confidence.
Domain experts Give feedback on prompt outputs and experiment with prompt engineering in an intuitive UI.
Product manager
Engineer
Domain expert
![features-set-second](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fproduct%2Fcursor-editor-bg.png&w=1080&q=75)
# Accelerate your AI strategy, safely
Iterate quickly to evaluate, debug, and optimize your systems based on real-world data.
[View trust report](https://humanloop.com/<https:/trust.humanloop.com>)[Compliance and security](https://humanloop.com/</platform/compliance-security>)
## Data Privacy
VPC deployment option
EU or US cloud hosted
Your data is never trained on
## Secure Access
Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
Custom SSO + SAML
3rd party certified pen testing
![soc2](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcompliance%2Fsoc2.png&w=64&q=75)
SOC-2 Type 2
![soc2](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcompliance%2Fgdpr.png&w=64&q=75)
GDPR
![soc2](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcompliance%2Fhipaa.png&w=64&q=75)
HIPAA Compliance via BAA
![](https://humanloop.com/assets/decoration/perlin-1.svg)
## Ready to build successful AI products?
Book a 1:1 demo for a guided tour of the platform tailored to your organization.
[Book a demo](https://humanloop.com/</demo>)
![Raza](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fheadshots%2Favatar-raza%403x.png&w=256&q=75)![Editor screenshot](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fproduct%2Fprompt-versions-screen%403x.png&w=3840&q=75)![Timo](https://humanloop.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fheadshots%2Favatar-timo%403x.png&w=256&q=75)
[![Structured Outputs: Everything You Should Know](https://humanloop.com/blog/structured-outputs/structured-outputs.png)](https://humanloop.com/</blog/structured-outputs>)

generated_description:
**Humanloop: The LLM Evaluation Platform for Enterprises**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from London, Humanloop emerged from Y Combinator's Batch S20 with a clear mission: to streamline the evaluation of large language models (LLMs) for enterprise use. The company specializes in providing a robust platform that helps businesses, including teams at Gusto, Vanta, and Duolingo, to develop, evaluate, and observe AI products efficiently and reliably.

### What They Do:

Humanloop addresses a fundamental challenge in AI development—conventional software workflows don't cut it for AI, which thrives on iterative, data-driven processes that require domain expertise. This is where Humanloop steps in, offering tools designed specifically for LLM evaluation:

1. **Development**: Their intuitive platform allows teams to create prompts and agents either through coding or a user interface. Every change is tracked for optimal version control.

2. **Evaluation**: Humanloop automates evaluations and integrates domain experts in the process, ensuring that AI outputs meet quality standards before deployment.

3. **Observability**: The platform provides real-time insights and alerts about model performance, letting teams proactively address issues before users are affected.
